name: i just wanted to talk about halo
name_original: i just wanted to talk about halo
description:
Made by a couple of memers in a week for fun. Entry for the "Only One of Any Asset" jam  O2A2 2022. 

NOTE: If you're playing the game in incognito mode in browser, you might see some warnings.

-------------------------------

The Game

You chat with a stranger on an Omegalul chatroom.  You both match on the topic of Halo. Surely this will go well.

Hit "A" for accessibility options. Adjust volume with the sliders at the top. 5-10 minutes of gameplay.

Contains: Loud noises, a cringelord, breathing, religious references, and nonsensical discussions.

-------------------------------

Credits

Destini Islands - writing/VA

Robobarbie - programming/art

Kija & Garret Bigger - Arrangement of "Halo" Main Theme

Zapsplat - sfx

Redstormpopcorn, Zero, Skaadenfroid, Yoohoo, Espresso Lalafell, Selendri - QA testers
